help:
You can use manual or automatic transmission in your car.
To enable manual transmission, use /gearsmanual. To enable automatic transmission, use /gearsauto.
Automatic gears are easier to use. Manual gears give you more control over the car's speed.
Default key to Shift Up: , (comma)
Default key to Shift Down: . (period)
You can redefine these binds in your Settings (Binds > Multiplayer Controls), on "shiftup" and "shiftdown". You can also set them to gamepad buttons.
You can go back to the normal MTA/GTA handling by disabling the gears with /gearsoff.
